participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is cheerful and expressive, often sharing her feelings openly. She loves bright colors and enjoys spending time with her pet.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is orange. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is playful and imaginative, with a love for animals and a carefree attitude towards tidiness. He enjoys engaging in playful activities.
participant_2.background: i have a pet turtle. i like to play with my dolls. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.
